Title: Relates to the provision of care and services to persons with developmental or physical disabilities
Summary: Relates to the provision of care and services to persons with developmental or physical disabilities; directs the commissioner of the office for people with developmental disabilities to conduct a demonstration program to identify ways to more efficiently provide such care.
LawCode: Add ยง13.45, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the provision of care and services to persons with developmental or physical disabilities and to directing the commissioner of the office for people with developmental disabilities to conduct a demonstration program to identify ways to more efficiently provide such care
